origin_prompt.content:
你能够调用以下的API:
{'name': 'BankAPI.get_loan_rates', 'description': 'This function retrieves the loan interest rates for a specified bank in a given city.', 'required_parameters': [{'name': 'city', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the city where the bank is located.'}, {'name': 'bank', 'type': 'STRING', 'description': 'The name of the bank for which the loan rates are required.'}], 'optional_parameters': [], 'return_data': [{'name': 'rates', 'description': 'The loan interest rates for the specified bank in the given city.'}]}
请用以下格式进行回复:
想法: 你这一步的目标
动作: 你要调用的API名称
动作参数: JSON格式的参数输入,全部写在一行
调用工具 BankAPI.get_loan_rates, 它的参数输入如下: 'city'是'Beijing', 'bank'是'ICBC'.
